text: Colobothea simillima is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Per Olof Christopher Aurivillius in 1902. It is known from Brazil, Uruguay, Argentina and Paraguay.BioLib.cz - Colobothea simillima. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Colobotheini Category:Beetles described in 1902
title: Colobothea simillima
